summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5804 for the improvement of 53rd Avenue Northeast, from East 65th Street to East 67th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 76514, as amended by Ordinance No. 76858, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
